item.description:

item.title: Cambridge Gardens south side, 29th June
item.description:
Ongoing Littering After Boot Sale at St. Augustine’s School Every weekend after the Boot Sale at St. Augustine’s School, vendors leave behind unwanted items and rubbish. This ongoing issue is not only unsightly—it’s disrespectful to local residents who take pride in keeping the neighbourhood clean. While a few profit from the event, the wider community is left to deal with the mess. This is unacceptable and needs to be addressed by the council. Proper oversight, post-event clean-up measures, and accountability are urgently required.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Gardens, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load
